text: The Virgin of Lust () is a 2002 Mexican drama movie directed by Arturo Ripstein and starring Luis Felipe Tovar, Ariadna Gil, Patricia Reyes Spíndola, Juan Diego, Julián Pastor, Alberto Estrella, Daniel Giménez Cacho. == Other websites == * Category:2002 drama movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Movies directed by Arturo Ripstein
title: The Virgin of Lust
